long_description: Introduce your young hikers to the joys of carrying their own gear in comfort and style with the Deuter Junior pack. Top-loading pack is ideal for carrying day-hiking essentials, clothing or toys. Padded shoulder straps and back panel are soft and nonirritating; sternum strap keeps straps secure. Quick-release buckles open easily-even for small hands. Reflective accents increase visibility in low light. Side mesh pockets hold water bottles or other small objects.
short_description: Introduce your young hikers to the joys of carrying their own gear in comfort and style with the Deuter Junior pack.
